description:
Yamamoto is led to the Phantom Knight, who Gamma claims is the strongest swordsman. Yamamoto remembers from Squalo`s fight records that this person is the 100th person to lose to Squalo. But the Phantom Knight reveals the shocking fact that he purposefully lost to Squalo. Yamamoto cannot believe his ears--! Meanwhile, Irie gets a report from his scouts, who have returned from the Vongola base. They report that the Millefiore are dominating. Furthermore, Iris and Ginger report that Spanner has not returned to his room!
Source: crunchyroll
